```{r}
library("dplyr")
```

#1. Load measurments data
```{r}
measurement<-read.csv("./measurements.csv")
```
#2. Sort data by species, then observer, then limb volume
```{r}
measurement<- measurement %>% group_by(Species_name,Observer,Volume)
measurement
```

```{r}
measurement<- measurement %>% group_by(Species_name)
```
```{r}
measurement<- measurement %>% group_by(Species_name) %>% group_by(Observer) %>% group_by(Volume)
```
